name: Biking full Day Can Gio Ecological Mangrove Forest
description: Transfer out of Saigon, cross Saigon river to Cangio. Bike ride to Forest Park ( Monkey island ), Visiting Can Gio Museum. Visiting Mangrove Forest Park Fauna Conservation: saltwater crocodiles, wild cats, otters, pythons, deer, and more than 1000 wild monkeys, which love to play with people.
